main event: A pulsating red light was observed over Seminole, New Mexico in November 1957.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 20.25 minutes,The reported object was described as very fast and pulsating in nature,Observers later sighted 4 or 5 aircraft in the westerly direction,The sighting was conducted at night with clear visibility conditions,The report suggested that the observed object might have been an aircraft.
witness description: connected with the police department of Seminole, N MEX
